Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by comparing the feeling of being required to stay at home to crucifixion.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the men in the photo are actually feeling crucified by being required to stay at home.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo was not taken during the pandemic and is being shared as a joke.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the men in the photo are protesting pandemic-era policies, which is not true.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting the photo as a representation of current events when it is not.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no evidence of alternative explanations being presented in the claim.
